resetLabels

public void resetLabels()
Resets the labels by using the values in the properties. Does not reset the status or the generation label, but resets all other labels.

setCurrentCursorPositionLabel

public void setCurrentCursorPositionLabel(Coordinate cursorsRowColCoordinate)
Sets the label showing the row and column position of the cursor.

Parameters:
cursorsRowColCoordinate - The row and column position of the cursor. May be null if the cursor is not over a cell or if the row and column do not make sense for the lattice (for example, a tree lattice).

setCurrentCursorValueLabel

public void setCurrentCursorValueLabel(java.lang.String value)
Sets the label showing the value of the cell under the cursor.

Parameters:
value - The text displayed as the value of the cell.

setCurrentDimensionsLabel

public void setCurrentDimensionsLabel()
Set the current dimensions label on the status panel. The method chooses appropriate text and gets the dimensions from the properties panel.

setCurrentLatticeLabel

public void setCurrentLatticeLabel()
Set the current lattice label on the status panel. The method chooses appropriate text and gets the lattice from the properties panel.

setCurrentNumberOfStatesLabel

public void setCurrentNumberOfStatesLabel()
Set the current number of states label on the status panel. The method chooses appropriate text and gets the number of states from the properties panel.

setCurrentNumberOfStatesLabel

public void setCurrentNumberOfStatesLabel(int numStates)
Set the current number of states label on the status panel. The method chooses appropriate text but uses the supplied number rather than the state number on the properties panel.

Parameters:
numStates - The number of states to display on the label.

setCurrentRuleLabel

public void setCurrentRuleLabel()
Set the current rule number label on the status panel. The method chooses appropriate text and gets the rule number from the properties panel.

setCurrentRuleLabel

public void setCurrentRuleLabel(java.math.BigInteger ruleNumber)
Set the rule number label on the status panel. The method chooses appropriate text but uses the supplied number rather than the number on the properties panel.

Parameters:
ruleNumber - The rule number to display on the label.

setCurrentRunningAverageLabel

public void setCurrentRunningAverageLabel()
Set the current running average label on the status panel. The method chooses appropriate text and gets the running average from the properties panel.

setGenerationLabel

public void setGenerationLabel(java.lang.String message)
Set the generation label on the status panel (in other words, the number of the generation).

Parameters:
message - The message to display on the label.

public void setStatusLabel(java.lang.String status)
